content.text: Welcome to stone age mod manual! If you find any bug in this manual or in mod, please report it to §phttps://github.com/yanny7/StoneAge/issues §6github§r.
Allow you to craft primitive items. Just put required items into workbench by right-click and then right-click with §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p to craft an item.
Drying rack is used for drying items like grass. Just right-click with item on drying rack and wait. Note that item is dried only during day.

Tanning rack is used for tanning §praw_hide §6raw hide§r§p to leather. Just put raw hide to tanning rack by right-click and then multiple times right-click on hide with §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p.
Stone chest allow you to store small amount of items. Still better than nothing!
Tree stump is way to get planks or half-slabs. Just put valid item on tree stump by right-click and then left-click with tool: for wood use axe, for stone use hammer.

Aquaduct allow you to transfer water near your crops. To fill aquaduct with water, put it near water source. To water nearby farmland, activate aquaduct with right-click. You will see bubbles when aquaduct is active and has water. Aquaduct transfer water horizontally and downward. Activated aquaduct also apply around §lbonemeal effect§r.
When wool is not available for you, you can still sleep on bed made of dried grass.

Feeder as name says, provide food for animals around. Just right-click to open menu and put inside food like wheat or seeds. Feeder with food inside speed-up growth rate of baby animals and for adult animals activate breeding randomly.
Millstone is used for milling wheat into grain. Right-click while sneak to open menu. There you can place wheat. Then right-click with empty hand to mill wheat.
Campfire is used for cooking food.
Vanilla crafting table, access to crafting table ends stone age.
Hay block, used for larger smoke when under campfire.
Used for passive fishing, just craft §pgrass_mesh §6grass mesh§r§p, put it into fishing net and wait. Around fishing net must be still water.
Bone meal can be made from crushed bones.

Raw hide drops from §pdeer §6deers§r§p, §pauroch §6aurochs§r§p, §pmammoth §6mammoths§r§p, §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p and from cows. Raw hide can be tanned into leather using §ptanning_rack §6tanning rack§r§p.
Antler drops from §pdeer §6deers§r§p. It is used for making antler tools.
Unlit torch can be lit by right-click on fire, campfire or another torch
Bone arrow head is used for crafting §parrow §6arrows§r§p.
Drought grass is used as crafting item or for making §pfire §6fire§r§p.
Leather strips is used as crafting item.
Fish bone drops from fishs and is used as crafting item.
Flour is used as crafting item.
Bread dough is used for crafting §pbread §6bread§r§p.
Woolly rhino tusk drops from §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhino§r§p.
Backpack is used for increase carrying capacity. Right-click with backpack to open it's inventory
Lead is used for leash animals and moving them around.
Leather is made in §ptanning_rack §6Tanning rack§r§p. Right-click with §praw_hide §6raw hide§r§p on tanning rack and then right-click multiple times with §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p.
Used in §pfishing_net §6fishing net§r§p, have 15 uses before breaking up.
Used in §pfishing_net §6fishing net§r§p, have 30 uses before breaking up.
Your first weapon, not very efficient, but help you survive and hunt animals. Also used for crafting items in §pflint_workbench §6flint workbench§r§p and for §ptanning_rack §6tanning§r§p.
Ranged weapon, similar to trident, but less efficient. Still very usefull for surviving and hunting in wild.

Fat drops from §pauroch §6aurochs§r§p, §pboar §6boars§r§p, §pdeer §6deers§r§p, §pdeer §6deers§r§p, §pmammoth §6mammoths§r§p, §pmouflon §6mouflons§r§p, §psaber_tooth_tiger §6saber-tooth tigers§r§p, §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p, cows, pigs and sheeps.
Rhino meat drops from from §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p.
Tiger meat drops from from §psaber_tooth_tiger §6saber-tooth tigers§r§p.
Ancestor of cows, you must breed them few generations until you get cow. It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
Ancestor of pigs, you must breed them few generations until you get pig. It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
Passive fearful mob, only source of antlers used for crafting first tools.
Ancestor of chickens, you must breed them few generations until you get chicken. It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
Big and strong animal. It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
Ancestor of sheeps, you must breed them few generations until you get sheep. It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
Big and dangerous animal, hunts down other smaller passive mobs like deers, fowls or §lyou§r.
It is passive mob, but when you attack it, all same species around will attack you.
You can make fire with two sticks: Drop §pdrought_grass §6drought grass§r§p into world, put stick into your right and left hand and righ-click on dropped drought grass.
